imdb.plot outline: The story is centered around a boy named Samuel Pilate, who as he continues to grow up, the struggle of his sanity becomes more and more greater. He suffers with schizophrenia, attempting to decide what he is seeing and hearing is reality becomes harder and harder for him to understand. Through the viewer's journey, you'll get to see the misery Samuel has to go through, and see how he overcomes it all. This is a story about good and evil, life and death, the light, and darkness within every human, through the life of Samuel Pilot.
imdb.title: Miserable
plot: The story is centered around a boy named Samuel Pilate, who as he continues to grow up, the struggle of his sanity becomes more and more greater. He suffers with schizophrenia, attempting to decide what he is seeing and hearing is reality becomes harder and harder for him to understand. Through the viewer's journey, you'll get to see the misery Samuel has to go through, and see how he overcomes it all. This is a story about good and evil, life and death, the light, and darkness within every human, through the life of Samuel Pilot.::Will Huddleston

Follow the life of Samuel Pilate as he tries to cope with his schizophrenia while also dealing with a religious family who believes his issue is of the devil and having to deal with the constant judgment from his religious parents that he will never be able to produce any good with so much evil within him. This is the ultimate story of good vs. evil.::Will Huddleston
